Description:
Self-motivated and target-driven with a passion for sales
Ability to work independently and as part of a team
Candidate must have passion to interact with customers and takes pride in serving them.
Candidate must be eager to learn from teammates and supervisors and develop new skills.
Must speak English at least.
Demonstrate and provide information of the product to the customers.Skills
Skills:
Create a positive image and lead consumers to use it.
Report Daily Sales and Other Related Activities as per the guidelines.
Desired candidate age must be from 22 to 28 years old only.
